column4: non ubuntu question here but i need some advice, does anyone know where to buy a laptop(notebook) without an OS on it, no use in paying for windows if im just going to install Ubuntu on it
are you thinking an old or new laptop?
have you looked at Dell?.. they are selling laptops w/ ubuntu preinstalled.
you still pay for "support" and they have limited models
just a suggestion, i really don't have an answer to your question.
